channel.title: -Updated Camelot PvP-
channel.description:
[center]Updated Camelot PvP By Infinity Ward/Mod Final
I'm gonna post some pictures tommorw if i don't post any tonight, i'm feeling a little sick.
~Server Run-Down~ Okay, this is basically Crazy PvP with more organized files, anti-flood, anti-lagg, some objects moved around/added, New Npc shops and text.
I'm basically releasing this source because alot of the players that come onto my server say they really like it and how it differs from other PvP sources, another reason is because i'm moving on from PvP servers to 317 economy servers.
Don't flame and look like a fool saying all i did is leech Crazy PvP and add some stuff.
~Client Issues~ You can use any 317 client except for ones that have the 459 emote tablets basically for instance Bluurs client.
There is no official client for camelot PvP based sources like this really, and theres no customs, Godswords Dragon Boots,Torsos items like that are replaced with Desert shirts, Bow swords, Red boots etc you get the picture.
~How do i change the login text to mine?~ Go into Client.Java and search the login text then change it to what you want it to say and compile.. congratulations your a pro leecher. :)
~Enjoy~ Leech it if you want, i don't really care just give me credits and Crazy PvP credits.. Reply back and give me your opinion about the server you can be mean if you want.
~Pictures Of Server~ [img]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx293/rofllmfao/Fubergen0003.png?t=1268015585[/img] [img]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx293/rofllmfao/Fubergen0004.png?t=1268015774[/img] [img]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx293/rofllmfao/Fubergen0011.png?t=1268015863[/img] [img]http://i765.photobucket.com/albums/xx293/rofllmfao/Fubergen0006.png?t=1268016004[/img] All the pics im gonna post for now, if the links are broken tell me so i can fix them!
~Credits~ Crazy PvP : 60% - Sorry i don't know the owners name. Infinity Ward/Mod Final : 40% - 40% Because i cleaned out all of that extra crap in his folders, adding anti-lagg, anti-flood, moving objects around etc.
~Download Links~ http://uppit.com/v/WY8RT0H0 - If the link does not work please tell me and i'll fix it![/center]

item.title: -Updated Camelot PvP-
item.dc:creator: @thesickpuma3 thesickpuma3
item.description:
@thesickpuma3 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:6, topic:332069”]2 Words for you Chuck…
TOTAL FAIL[/quote]

/\ EXACTLY!!!

Rash:

Whats different?

Absolutely nothing… as proved by this guy
/ /

[quote=“ytuio9, post:8, topic:332069”]lmao i could add this in about 2 minutes. also…

original post:

There is no official client for camelot PvP based sources like this really, and theres no customs, Godswords Dragon Boots,Torsos items like that are replaced with Desert shirts, Bow swords, Red boots etc you get the picture.

lol? have you looked in the client that was used for cammy pvp? has void, gs’s, dragon fire shield, d boots, all gs’s, armadyl and probably much more but i’m just too tired to search for the ID’s.

edit: lmao, you call that cleaned? that is basically the same file and you even added more crap. to prove it, if you dl the original cammy pvp you’ll find that it barely reaches 550 kb’s… that means you probably haven’t even removed anything.
oh and before you tell me “noob i editted other files” i checked them too and they were exactly the same. so GF[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: -Updated Camelot PvP-
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Infinity Ward:

Program you didn’t even read it did you, plus 5%? I cleaned out the older of all its excess junk, made a working highscores that automatically adds a players name when hes reacher over 100 pk points, added anti-lagg and anti-flood, of course it looks like Crazy PvP but its a better version of it…Anyone who’s smart enough would use a version like this over The origional Crazy PvP…

2 Words for you Chuck…
TOTAL FAIL
